title-group.article-title: Turn Word documents into structured JATS with Texture

abstract.p: This is an article abstract, with a single paragraph

sec.title: Introduction
sec.p: Texture is a tool for publishers for creating structured JATS documents based on Word or InDesign submissions. Texture is developed by the Substance Consortium ([1]) formed by the Public Knowledge Project (PKP), the Collaborative Knowledge Foundation (CoKo) and Érudit.
The tool is available as open source on Github ([2]) and
